sales module

sales.get_available_goods()[source]

Get all goods with a stock greater than 0.

Returns:

If success, all the available goods. Else, error message in case of a problem.

Return type:

flask.Response

sales.get_good_details(id)[source]

Get a product’s details.

Parameters:

id (int) – The product’s id.

Returns:

If successful, the product’s details. Else, an error message.

Return type:

flask.Response

sales.record_sales()[source]

Register a new transaction. Need to pass in the post request the username, the good, and the quantity.

Returns:

Success message if transaction is successful. Else, error message in case of a problem.

Return type:

flask.Response
